comment: So the Proud Boys who DEFENDED themselves from physical assault and bottle throwing by Antifa, caught on camera as instigating, are being referred to as Neo-Nazis, white supremacists and "Alt-Right" by the MSM. Someone better tell his black wife then.
amr:
# ::snt So the Proud Boys who DEFENDED themselves from physical assault and bottle throwing by Antifa, caught on camera as instigating, are being referred to as Neo-Nazis, white supremacists and "Alt-Right" by the MSM. Someone better tell his black wife then.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / cause-01
            :ARG1 (r / refer-01
                  :ARG0 (p / publication
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "MSM"))
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :mod (p3 / political-movement
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Protest"
                                          :op2 "Boys"))
                              :ARG0-of (d / defend-01
                                    :ARG2 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (a3 / assault-01
                                                :ARG0 (o / organization
                                                      :name (n3 / name
                                                            :op1 "Antifa"))
                                                :ARG1 p2
                                                :mod (p4 / physical))
                                          :op2 (t / throw-01
                                                :ARG0 o
                                                :ARG1 (b / bottle)
                                                :ARG2 o)
                                          :ARG1-of (c2 / catch-01
                                                :ARG0 (c3 / camera)
                                                :ARG2 (ii / instigate-01
                                                      :ARG0 o
                                                      :ARG1 p2))))
                              :ARG1-of d)
                        :ARG2 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (p5 / person
                                    :mod (p6 / political-movement
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "neo-Nazism")))
                              :op2 (p7 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (w / white-02))
                              :op3 (p8 / person
                                    :mod (e / extreme)
                                    :ARG1-of (r2 / right-08))))))
      :snt2 (r3 / recommend-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / tell-01
                  :ARG0 (s / someone)
                  :ARG2 (p9 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 s
                              :ARG2 (w2 / wife))
                        :ARG1-of (b2 / black-05))
                  :mod (t3 / then))
            :ARG2 s))

comment: Those words are not needed and can be removed
amr:
# ::snt Those words are not needed and can be removed
(a / and
      :op1 (n / need-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :mod (t / that)))
      :op2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (r / remove-01
                  :ARG1 w)))

comment: The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
amr:
# ::snt The R word is highly offensive.  Spread the word to end the word!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / offend-01
            :ARG0 (w / word
                  :mod (s / string-entity
                        :value "R"))
            :degree (h / high-02))
      :snt2 (s2 / spread-03
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w2 / word)
            :purpose (e / end-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 w2)))

comment: The N word and language denigrating someone's race is unacceptable. Please refrain from future use.
amr:
# ::snt The N word and language denigrating someone's race is unacceptable. Please refrain from future use.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (w / word
                              :mod (s / string-entity
                                    :value "N"))
                        :op2 (l / language)
                        :ARG0-of (d / denigrate-01
                              :ARG1 (r / race
                                    :poss (s2 / someone))))))
      :snt2 (r2 / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :time (f / future))))
